item.title: Trump says he will take legal action against BBC over Panorama edit
item.description: The US president confirmed he intends to sue the broadcaster for at least $1bn over the Panorama edit of a 2021 speech.

item.title: Trump targets longtime MAGA ally Marjorie Taylor Greene
item.description: The Georgia congresswoman has criticised Trump's focus on foreign policy and handling of Jeffrey Epstein files.

item.title: China urges citizens not to visit Japan over Taiwan row
item.description: Japanese PM Sanae Takaichi had suggested Tokyo could take military action if Beijing attacked Taiwan.

item.title: Prashant Kishor: Why India's political start-ups rarely succeed
item.description: Prashant Kishorâ€™s new party, Jan Suraaj, created a media splash but flopped, winning no seats in Bihar.

item.title: US justice department investigates Epstein's alleged ties to Clinton and banks after Trump request
item.description: Democrats are accusing Trump of using the justice department to deflect from his previous relationship with Epstein.
